title: MSB5028 error message has "System.Collections.Generic.HashSet`1[System.String]" as solution filter name
body:
<!-- This is a template that helps us provide quicker feedback. Please use any relevant sections and delete anything you don't need. -->

### Issue Description
1. Solution filter file at "System.Collections.Generic.HashSet\`1[System.String]" indicates a wrong file location.
2. C:\Users\hadri\source\repos\CSharpMath\Csproj2\Csproj2.csproj does not indicate the correct project location.
3. Error message is seen twice.

### Steps to Reproduce

[SlnfAndShproj.zip](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/files/5175226/SlnfAndShproj.zip)
```
hadri@Home MINGW64 ~/source/repos/CSharpMath (Benchmark)
$ dotnet build ../SlnfAndShproj/ErrorMSB5028.slnf
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 16.8.0-preview-20414-02+a55ce4fbb for .NET
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

C:\Users\hadri\source\repos\CSharpMath\Csproj2\Csproj2.csproj : Solution file error MSB5028: Solution filter file at "System.Collections.Generic.HashSet`1[System.String]" includes project "Csproj2\Csproj2.csproj" that is not in the solution file at "C:\Users\hadri\source\repos\SlnfAndShproj\SlnfAndShproj.sln".

Build FAILED.

C:\Users\hadri\source\repos\CSharpMath\Csproj2\Csproj2.csproj : Solution file error MSB5028: Solution filter file at "System.Collections.Generic.HashSet`1[System.String]" includes project "Csproj2\Csproj2.csproj" that is not in the solution file at "C:\Users\hadri\source\repos\SlnfAndShproj\SlnfAndShproj.sln".
    0 Warning(s)
    1 Error(s)

Time Elapsed 00:00:00.19

```

### Expected Behavior
1. Solution filter file at "C:\Users\hadri\source\repos\SlnfAndShproj\ErrorMSB5028.slnf"
2. C:\Users\hadri\source\repos\SlnfAndShproj\Csproj2\Csproj2.csproj
3. Error message is seen once.

### Actual Behavior
1. Solution filter file at "System.Collections.Generic.HashSet\`1[System.String]"
2. C:\Users\hadri\source\repos\CSharpMath\Csproj2\Csproj2.csproj
3. Error message is seen twice.

### Analysis
1. Probably used the wrong object in string formatting.
2. Project file path should take relative paths into account instead of relying on the current directory.
3. I have no idea

### Versions & Configurations
```
hadri@Home MINGW64 ~/source/repos/CSharpMath (Benchmark)
$ dotnet --info
```

nodes.body: Thanks for reporting this! I made a PR that should fix the first two problems [here](https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/5732). The third is expected—each error is printed once as it's found, and after the build is complete, it lists them all out at once. That's true for all our other errors as well.
